entry_requirements.visa_required_note: Indian passport holders must obtain a Singapore visa before traveling. For regular visits (tourism, business, or family), a pre-approved visa is mandatory.

visa_types.name: Tourist Visa (Visit Visa)
visa_types.note: Validity period decided by ICA Singapore based on travel history

visa_types.name: Business Visa
visa_types.note: Validity period decided by ICA Singapore based on travel history

application_method: Authorized visa agents (mandatory for Indian citizens)
Local Singapore Contact (LOI) - if sponsored by Singapore resident

common: Passport (valid for at least 6 months, 2 blank pages)
Recent Passport-size Photo (35mm x 45mm, white background)
Cover Letter (explaining purpose and duration of visit)
Hotel Booking OR invitation letter from friend/family in Singapore
Financial Proof: Latest bank statement (3â€“6 months) with â‚¹50,000+ balance

visa_validity_and_stay.note: Validity period decided by ICA Singapore based on travel history

visa_fees.note: You will receive a PDF e-visa via email which must be printed and carried when traveling

application_steps: Choose an authorized agent (VFS, Thomas Cook, Akbar Travels, etc.)
Fill out visa form and submit documents

conditions: Hold a valid visa/residence permit for US, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, Switzerland, or New Zealand
Must be in transit through Singapore to or from these countries
Have confirmed onward flight within 96 hours
visa_free_transit.note: VFTF is strictly for connecting flights, not for tourism

application_restrictions.direct_applications: Singapore does not accept direct applications from Indian citizens
application_restrictions.mandatory_route: Must apply through Singapore-authorized visa agent in India
application_restrictions.embassy_policy: Singapore High Commission in New Delhi and Consulate in Mumbai do not accept walk-in applications

penalties_and_tips.overstay_penalty: Serious offense â€“ leads to fines or blacklisting
tips: Always carry a printout of your e-Visa, hotel bookings, and return tickets
Carry sufficient funds or a credit card â€“ immigration may ask at entry
Travel insurance is recommended but not mandatory
Processing may take longer during holidays or peak travel seasons
Must go through authorized agents only

alternative_application.description: If you have a relative or friend in Singapore, they can sponsor you
alternative_application.process: Sponsor submits LOI via the ICA website
alternative_application.requirement: Must have Singapore resident/citizen as sponsor
